thread.title: Expats keep the faith in offshore banks despite poor rewards

author: Mike Goodman
title: Expats keep the faith in offshore banks despite poor rewards
text: Expat Money Expats keep the faith in offshore banks despite poor rewards Such banks have not lost their appeal, despite a shrinking number of providers and poorer interest rates than onshore accounts Where do expats put their money? A new survey shone a light on saving and investing habits Photo: AP By Mike Goodman
